price: Pagkatapos sasabihin sa kanila: “Nasaan na ang dati ninyo itinatambal
arabic: ثُمَّ قِيلَ لَهُمۡ أَيۡنَ مَا كُنتُمۡ تُشۡرِكُونَ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: thumma qīla lahum ayna mā kuntum tush'rikūna
